name: Ronin's Revenge
description:
Hello! 

Ronin's Revenge is a 2d action-platformer in wich you play as a samurai that lost his master. And you must get revenge!

It consists of 15 levels with many traps and enemeys. In the end you will have a chance to succeed your mission - final Boss Fight!

Need to use keyboard and mouse or just keyboard.

LMB or Z to attack, A and D or arrows to move and Space to jump. Also you have Double Jump in the very beginning.

Updated:
- Swordsmen now have 2hp instead of 3hp
- Changed Main Menu and Pause Menu
- Spikes don't fall through platforms
- Some too difficult places were made a little bit easier

Hope you will ejoy it!

Follow me on Twitterhttps://twitter.com/ice_drum_games
